quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks.
name: John Muir

quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
name: Satchel Paige

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: No man was ever wise by chance.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The pine stays green in winter... wisdom in hardship.
name: Norman Douglas

quote: Talent is God given. Be humble. Fame is man-given. Be grateful. Conceit is self-given. Be careful.
name: John Wooden

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
name: Socrates

quote: People don't notice whether it's winter or summer when they're happy.
name: Anton Chekhov

quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: Wisdom, compassion, and courage are the three universally recognized moral qualities of men.
name: Confucius

quote: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
name: Anton Chekhov

quote: It's the little details that are vital. Little things make big things happen.
name: John Wooden

quote: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.
name: William Arthur Ward

quote: Start with what is right rather than what is acceptable.
name: Franz Kafka

quote: A good head and a good heart are always a formidable combination.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: Our character is what we do when we think no one is looking.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.
name: Confucius

quote: The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique.
name: Walt Disney

quote: It is not wisdom but Authority that makes a law.
name: Thomas Hobbes

quote: You always have two choices: your commitment versus your fear.
name: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
name: Jimi Hendrix

quote: I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Where there is charity and wisdom, there is neither fear nor ignorance.
name: Francis of Assisi

quote: Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Commitment is an act, not a word.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Whatever you do in life, surround yourself with smart people who'll argue with you.
name: John Wooden

quote: The doorstep to the temple of wisdom is a knowledge of our own ignorance.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Silence is true wisdom's best reply.
name: Euripides

quote: Set your course by the stars, not by the lights of every passing ship.
name: Omar N. Bradley

quote: Knowing others is wisdom, knowing yourself is Enlightenment.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: It's better to be a lion for a day than a sheep all your life.
name: Elizabeth Kenny

quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
name: Epictetus

quote: A charming woman... doesn't follow the crowd. She is herself.
name: Loretta Young

quote: Wise sayings often fall on barren ground, but a kind word is never thrown away.
name: Arthur Helps

quote: Honesty is the best policy.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: He is no fool who gives what he cannot keep to gain what he cannot lose.
name: Jim Elliot

quote: True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing.
name: Socrates

quote: The greatest obstacle to discovery is not ignorance - it is the illusion of knowledge.
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: If you don't know where you are going, any road will get you there.
name: Lewis Carroll

quote: The way you see people is the way you treat them, and the way you treat them is what they become.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: What wisdom can you find that is greater than kindness?
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: Spectacular achievement is always preceded by unspectacular preparation.
name: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Experience is not what happens to you; it's what you do with what happens to you.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: Wisdom begins in wonder.
name: Socrates

quote: Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: Beware of false knowledge; it is more dangerous than ignorance.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
name: Will Rogers

quote: O, what a tangled web we weave when first we practise to deceive!
name: Walter Scott

quote: To acquire knowledge, one must study; but to acquire wisdom, one must observe.
name: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: Always seek out the seed of triumph in every adversity.
name: Og Mandino

quote: There are three faithful friends - an old wife, an old dog, and ready money.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: There are many ways of going forward, but only one way of standing still.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Never interrupt someone doing what you said couldn't be done.
name: Amelia Earhart

quote: Everything comes to us that belongs to us if we create the capacity to receive it.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Step with care and great tact, and remember that Life's a Great Balancing Act.
name: Dr. Seuss

quote: Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosophy.
name: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: Deliberately seek opportunities for kindness, sympathy, and patience.
name: Evelyn Underhill

quote: Don't gain the world and lose your soul; wisdom is better than silver or gold.
name: Bob Marley

quote: The truth is not for all men, but only for those who seek it.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present.
name: Joan Rivers

quote: Climb the mountains and get their good tidings.
name: John Muir

quote: Knowledge is proud that it knows so much; wisdom is humble that it knows no more.
name: William Cowper

quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
name: Henry Ford

quote: Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity.
name: George S. Patton

quote: Be as you wish to seem.
name: Socrates

quote: The truest wisdom is a resolute determination.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The young man knows the rules, but the old man knows the exceptions.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: I'd rather regret the things I've done than regret the things I haven't done.
name: Lucille Ball

quote: A long habit of not thinking a thing wrong gives it a superficial appearance of being right.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Talent is God-given; be humble. Fame is man-given; be thankful. Conceit is self-given; be careful.
name: Harvey Mackay

quote: The time to repair the roof is when the sun is shining.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: You've got to go out on a limb sometimes because that's where the fruit is.
name: Will Rogers

quote: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself again and again.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.
name: Carl Jung

quote: Wisdom consists of the anticipation of consequences.
name: Norman Cousins

quote: Beware, so long as you live, of judging men by their outward appearance.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: Democracy is a pathetic belief in the collective wisdom of individual ignorance.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: Knowledge is knowing that a tomato is a fruit. Wisdom is knowing not to put it in a fruit salad.
name: Brian O'Driscoll

quote: Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: If you want a thing done well, do it yourself.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: If you only have a hammer, you tend to see every problem as a nail.
name: Abraham Maslow

quote: Think big thoughts but relish small pleasures.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Give me a lever long enough and a fulcrum on which to place it, and I shall move the world.
name: Archimedes

quote: Kindness is more important than wisdom, and the recognition of this is the beginning of wisdom.
name: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quote: To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Appearances are often deceiving.
name: Aesop

quote: The road of excess leads to the palace of wisdom.
name: William Blake

quote: Earthly wisdom is doing what comes naturally. Godly wisdom is doing what the Holy Spirit compels us to do.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: Memory is the mother of all wisdom.
name: Aeschylus

quote: The doors of wisdom are never shut.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
name: Judy Garland

quote: To light one candle to God and another to the Devil is the principle of wisdom.
name: Jose Bergamin

quote: The greater our knowledge increases the more our ignorance unfolds.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: We cannot become what we need to be by remaining what we are.
name: Max de Pree

quote: It requires wisdom to understand wisdom: the music is nothing if the audience is deaf.
name: Walter Lippmann

quote: Today's mighty oak is just yesterday's nut, that held its ground.
name: David Icke

quote: We gain the strength of the temptation we resist.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: When in doubt, don't.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Nothing that you have not given away will ever be really yours.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
name: William James

quote: Follow your instincts. That's where true wisdom manifests itself.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: It's easier to resist at the beginning than at the end.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: A little knowledge that acts is worth infinitely more than much knowledge that is idle.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: The function of wisdom is to discriminate between good and evil.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: The more sand that has escaped from the hourglass of our life, the clearer we should see through it.
name: Jean Paul

quote: It is like the seed put in the soil - the more one sows, the greater the harvest.
name: Orison Swett Marden

quote: A day of worry is more exhausting than a week of work.
name: John Lubbock

quote: To know one's self is wisdom, but not to know one's neighbors is genius.
name: Minna Antrim

quote: The smallest deed is better than the greatest intention.
name: John Burroughs

quote: It is better to rust out than wear out.
name: Edwin Markham

quote: There is more wisdom in your body than in your deepest philosophy.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Life is a travelling to the edge of knowledge, then a leap taken.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: A heart well prepared for adversity in bad times hopes, and in good times fears for a change in fortune.
name: Horace

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: My advice to you is not to inquire why or whither, but just enjoy your ice cream while it's on your plate.
name: Thornton Wilder

quote: Meditation is the soul's perspective glass.
name: Owen Feltham

quote: Seek the lofty by reading, hearing and seeing great work at some moment every day.
name: Thornton Wilder

quote: Logic is the beginning of wisdom, not the end.
name: Leonard Nimoy

quote: If you have the guts to keep making mistakes, your wisdom and intelligence leap forward with huge momentum.
name: Holly Near

quote: Never reach out your hand unless you're willing to extend an arm.
name: Pope Paul VI

quote: The man of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies but also to hate his friends.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: With pride, there are many curses. With humility, there come many blessings.
name: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: They must often change, who would be constant in happiness or wisdom.
name: Confucius

quote: Mistakes are the usual bridge between inexperience and wisdom.
name: Phyllis Theroux

quote: If suffering brings wisdom, I would wish to be less wise.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: Does wisdom perhaps appear on the earth as a raven which is inspired by the smell of carrion?
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Between saying and doing, many a pair of shoes is worn out.
name: Iris Murdoch

quote: Blessed are those who give without remembering and take without forgetting.
name: Elizabeth Bibesco

quote: The saddest aspect of life right now is that science gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom.
name: Isaac Asimov

quote: All human wisdom is summed up in two words; wait and hope.
name: Alexandre Dumas

quote: Be happy. It's one way of being wise.
name: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quote: Since human wisdom cannot secure us from accidents, it is the greatest effort of reason to bear them well.
name: John Paul Jones

quote: In wisdom gathered over time I have found that every experience is a form of exploration.
name: Ansel Adams

quote: The fall of dropping water wears away the Stone.
name: Lucretius

quote: Slow and steady wins the race.
name: Robert Lloyd

quote: Wisdom outweighs any wealth.
name: Sophocles

quote: When a thing is done, it's done. Don't look back. Look forward to your next objective.
name: George C. Marshall

quote: None knows the weight of another's burden.
name: George Herbert

quote: To keep your secret is wisdom; to expect others to keep it is folly.
name: William Samuel Johnson

quote: Nine-tenths of wisdom is being wise in time.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: There is a wisdom of the head, and a wisdom of the heart.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: It is a characteristic of wisdom not to do desperate things.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Start wide, expand further, and never look back.
name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Every silver lining has a cloud.
name: Mary Kay Ash

quote: What happens is not as important as how you react to what happens.
name: Ellen Glasgow

quote: All this worldly wisdom was once the unamiable heresy of some wise man.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Music is your own experience, your own thoughts, your wisdom.
name: Charlie Parker

quote: The motto of chivalry is also the motto of wisdom; to serve all, but love only one.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Knowledge comes, but wisdom lingers.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: The most certain sign of wisdom is cheerfulness.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: To win without risk is to triumph without glory.
name: Pierre Corneille

quote: A ruffled mind makes a restless pillow.
name: Charlotte Bronte

quote: The opinion which other people have of you is their problem, not yours.
name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: It is the nature of the wise to resist pleasures, but the foolish to be a slave to them.
name: Epictetus

quote: Swim upstream. Go the other way. Ignore the conventional wisdom.
name: Sam Walton

quote: Irony is the gaiety of reflection and the joy of wisdom.
name: Anatole France

quote: The wisdom of the wise, and the experience of ages, may be preserved by quotation.
name: Isaac D'Israeli

quote: The sweetest of all sounds is praise.
name: Xenophon

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
name: Alan Kay

quote: I have devoted my life to uncertainty. Certainty is the death of wisdom, thought, creativity.
name: Shekhar Kapur

quote: Mixing one's wines may be a mistake, but old and new wisdom mix admirably.
name: Bertolt Brecht

quote: In complete darkness, it is only knowledge and wisdom that separates us.
name: Janet Jackson

quote: I do not believe in the collective wisdom of individual ignorance.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Giving opens the way for receiving.
name: Florence Scovel Shinn

quote: Wisdom lies neither in fixity nor in change, but in the dialectic between the two.
name: Octavio Paz

quote: Perspective is worth 80 IQ points.
name: Alan Kay

quote: The world is a diverse place. Nobody has a monopoly on virtue or wisdom.
name: Lee Hsien Loong

quote: You need to have extraordinary wisdom to be the forerunner.
name: Ma Huateng

quote: Wisdom is the power to put our time and our knowledge to the proper use.
name: Thomas J. Watson

quote: It is plain to me that our prelates, in granting indulgences, do commonly blaspheme the wisdom of God.
name: John Wycliffe

quote: A man should always consider how much he has more than he wants.
name: Joseph Addison

quote: A mouse does not rely on just one hole.
name: Plautus

quote: The invariable mark of wisdom is to see the miraculous in the common.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: All things must come to the soul from its roots, from where it is planted.
name: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: Kisses are a better fate than wisdom.
name: e. e. cummings

quote: Always keep an open mind and a compassionate heart.
name: Phil Jackson

quote: There are three classes of men; lovers of wisdom, lovers of honor, and lovers of gain.
name: Plato

quote: Cunning... is but the low mimic of wisdom.
name: Plato

quote: Once you label me you negate me.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Tragedy is a tool for the living to gain wisdom, not a guide by which to live.
name: Robert Kennedy

quote: A poem begins in delight and ends in wisdom.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Nobody can give you wiser advice than yourself.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: How many cares one loses when one decides not to be something but to be someone.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: Pure, holy simplicity confounds all the wisdom of this world and the wisdom of the flesh.
name: Francis of Assisi

quote: Make it your habit not to be critical about small things.
name: Edward Everett Hale

quote: The higher we are placed, the more humbly we should walk.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: When you give yourself, you receive more than you give.
name: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Never find fault with the absent.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: If I am fool, it is, at least, a doubting one; and I envy no one the certainty of his self-approved wisdom.
name: Lord Byron

quote: Genius unrefined resembles a flash of lightning, but wisdom is like the sun.
name: Franz Grillparzer

quote: It is the province of knowledge to speak, and it is the privilege of wisdom to listen.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: It is astonishing what force, purity, and wisdom it requires for a human being to keep clear of falsehoods.
name: Margaret Fuller

quote: Better be wise by the misfortunes of others than by your own.
name: Aesop

quote: Knowledge which is divorced from justice, may be called cunning rather than wisdom.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Who is wise in love, love most, say least.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: No one wants advice - only corroboration.
name: John Steinbeck

quote: Many sophisticated, intelligent people lack wisdom and common sense.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: But life is long. And it is the long run that balances the short flare of interest and passion.
name: Sylvia Plath

quote: Age does not bring you wisdom, age brings you wrinkles.
name: Estelle Getty

quote: Wisdom is the abstract of the past, but beauty is the promise of the future.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: When an opponent comes forward, move in and greet him; if he wants to pull back, send him on his way.
name: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: Discipline is wisdom and vice versa.
name: M. Scott Peck

quote: Look around for a place to sow a few seeds.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Some wisdom you must learn from one who's wise.
name: Euripides

quote: Wisdom is not wisdom when it is derived from books alone.
name: Horace

quote: Wisdom oft times consists of knowing what to do next.
name: Herbert Hoover

quote: We all admire the wisdom of people who come to us for advice.
name: Arthur Helps

quote: It is much more difficult to measure nonperformance than performance.
name: Harold S. Geneen

quote: Knowledge shrinks as wisdom grows.
name: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: To build a great company, which is a CEO's job, sometimes you have to stand up against conventional wisdom.
name: Carly Fiorina

quote: Strong characters are brought out by change of situation, and gentle ones by permanence.
name: Jean Paul

quote: If you want to go east, don't go west.
name: Ramakrishna

quote: Wisdom is a kind of knowledge. It is knowledge of the nature, career, and consequences of human values.
name: Sidney Hook

quote: Doubt the conventional wisdom unless you can verify it with reason and experiment.
name: Steve Albini

quote: One of the greatest pieces of economic wisdom is to know what you do not know.
name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: A man may learn wisdom even from a foe.
name: Aristophanes

quote: Wisdom is knowing what to do next; virtue is doing it.
name: David Starr Jordan

quote: Counsel woven into the fabric of real life is wisdom.
name: Walter Benjamin

quote: That which seems the height of absurdity in one generation often becomes the height of wisdom in another.
name: Adlai Stevenson I

quote: Wisdom and knowledge are the most valuable things in the body.
name: Masayoshi Son

quote: The wisdom of the wise is an uncommon degree of common sense.
name: William Inge

quote: Let deeds match words.
name: Plautus

quote: Even wisdom has to yield to self-interest.
name: Pindar

quote: Our deeds determine us, as much as we determine our deeds.
name: George Eliot

quote: Everything in the world may be endured except continual prosperity.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Quick decisions are unsafe decisions.
name: Sophocles

quote: Nature and books belong to the eyes that see them.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Before we acquire great power we must acquire wisdom to use it well.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The attempt to combine wisdom and power has only rarely been successful and then only for a short while.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: I don't have the strength or wisdom to get through a single day without guidance and grace from God.
name: Tony Dungy

quote: Avoid having your ego so close to your position that when your position falls, your ego goes with it.
name: Colin Powell

quote: Wisdom has its root in goodness, not goodness its root in wisdom.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The sum of wisdom is that time is never lost that is devoted to work.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: We are wiser than we know.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: It has long been an axiom of mine that the little things are infinitely the most important.
name: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that is the stuff life is made of.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The virtue of justice consists in moderation, as regulated by wisdom.
name: Aristotle

quote: Ignorance and bungling with love are better than wisdom and skill without.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I praise loudly. I blame softly.
name: Catherine the Great

quote: The opportunity for brotherhood presents itself every time you meet a human being.
name: Jane Wyman

quote: Don't taunt the alligator until after you've crossed the creek.
name: Dan Rather

quote: It is better to risk starving to death then surrender. If you give up on your dreams, what's left?
name: Jim Carrey

quote: Leave no stone unturned.
name: Euripides

quote: Wisdom is the reward you get for a lifetime of listening when you'd have preferred to talk.
name: Doug Larson

quote: Knowledge without justice ought to be called cunning rather than wisdom.
name: Plato

quote: Wisdom alone is the science of other sciences.
name: Plato

quote: It isn't what you do, but how you do it.
name: John Wooden

quote: Applause is a receipt, not a bill.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: It is impossible to love and to be wise.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: I know that inner wisdom is more precious than wealth. The more you spend it, the more you gain.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: To profit from good advice requires more wisdom than to give it.
name: Wilson Mizner

quote: The superior man blames himself. The inferior man blames others.
name: Don Shula

quote: We all grow up. Hopefully, we get wiser. Age brings wisdom, and fatherhood changes one's life completely.
name: Frank Abagnale

quote: Wisdom is oftentimes nearer when we stoop than when we soar.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: I have studied many philosophers and many cats. The wisdom of cats is infinitely superior.
name: Hippolyte Taine

quote: Please all, and you will please none.
name: Aesop

quote: Gray hairs are signs of wisdom if you hold your tongue, speak and they are but hairs, as in the young.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Success is not to be pursued; it is to be attracted by the person you become.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: If I don't have wisdom, I can teach you only ignorance.
name: Leo Buscaglia

quote: You can observe a lot by watching.
name: Yogi Berra

quote: Holy wisdom confounds Satan and all his wickednesses.
name: Francis of Assisi

quote: Habit, if not resisted, soon becomes necessity.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: The older I grow the more I distrust the familiar doctrine that age brings wisdom.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: Ignorant men raise questions that wise men answered a thousand years ago.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Few people have the wisdom to prefer the criticism that would do them good, to the praise that deceives them.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Wisdom comes alone through suffering.
name: Aeschylus

quote: If the world were perfect, it wouldn't be.
name: Yogi Berra

quote: A promise made is a debt unpaid.
name: Robert W. Service

quote: In life, all good things come hard, but wisdom is the hardest to come by.
name: Lucille Ball

quote: It is the neglect of timely repair that makes rebuilding necessary.
name: Richard Whately

quote: Common sense in an uncommon degree is what the world calls wisdom.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Vanity can easily overtake wisdom. It usually overtakes common sense.
name: Julian Casablancas

quote: To wear your heart on your sleeve isn't a very good plan; you should wear it inside, where it functions best.
name: Margaret Thatcher

quote: The hours of folly are measured by the clock; but of wisdom, no clock can measure.
name: William Blake

quote: Wisdom too often never comes, and so one ought not to reject it merely because it comes late.
name: Felix Frankfurter

quote: The day of fortune is like a harvest day, We must be busy when the corn is ripe.
name: Torquato Tasso

quote: Of prosperity mortals can never have enough.
name: Aeschylus

quote: It is good even for old men to learn wisdom.
name: Aeschylus

quote: This is what I learned: that everybody is talented, original and has something important to say.
name: Brenda Ueland

quote: Science is always discovering odd scraps of magical wisdom and making a tremendous fuss about its cleverness.
name: Aleister Crowley

quote: Wise men make more opportunities than they find.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Wisdom sails with wind and time.
name: John Florio

quote: Singleness of purpose is one of the chief essentials for success in life, no matter what may be one's aim.
name: John D. Rockefeller

quote: The wheel that squeaks the loudest is the one that gets the grease.
name: Josh Billings

quote: Cleverness is not wisdom.
name: Euripides

quote: Contemplation and wisdom are highest achievements and man is not totally at home with them.
name: Gabriel Marcel

quote: An ounce of cheerfulness is worth a pound of sadness to serve God with.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: I consider wisdom supernatural because it isn't taught by men - it's a gift from God.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Love is the wisdom of the fool and the folly of the wise.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: Rightly defined philosophy is simply the love of wisdom.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: With age comes common sense and wisdom.
name: Nas

quote: They whom truth and wisdom lead, can gather honey from a weed.
name: William Cowper

quote: Rich people without wisdom and learning are but sheep with golden fleeces.
name: Solon

quote: It takes a great man to give sound advice tactfully, but a greater to accept it graciously.
name: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: I'm married. My wife, Stella - a beautiful woman. She's brought a lot of peace to my life, a lot of wisdom.
name: Anthony Hopkins

quote: Wisdom is a sacred communion.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: If you call failures experiments, you can put them in your resume and claim them as achievements.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: Wisdom comes by disillusionment.
name: George Santayana

quote: Wisdom is found only in truth.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: In action a great heart is the chief qualification. In work, a great head.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Fear cannot be without hope nor hope without fear.
name: Baruch Spinoza

quote: The greater the step forward in knowledge, the greater is the one taken backward in search of wisdom.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: Plodding wins the race.
name: Aesop

quote: We never understand how little we need in this world until we know the loss of it.
name: James M. Barrie

quote: Habit is the nursery of errors.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Magnanimity in politics is not seldom the truest wisdom; and a great empire and little minds go ill together.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: The truest greatness lies in being kind, the truest wisdom in a happy mind.
name: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: Morality comes with the sad wisdom of age, when the sense of curiosity has withered.
name: Graham Greene

quote: The wisdom of man never yet contrived a system of taxation that would operate with perfect equality.
name: Andrew Jackson

quote: As you walk down the fairway of life you must smell the roses, for you only get to play one round.
name: Ben Hogan

quote: A closed mouth catches no flies.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: The beginning of wisdom is to desire it.
name: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

quote: Wisdom is the knowledge of good and evil, not the strength to choose between the two.
name: John Cheever

quote: The first point of wisdom is to discern that which is false; the second, to know that which is true.
name: Lactantius

quote: First appearance deceives many.
name: Ovid

quote: To advise is not to compel.
name: Anton Chekhov

quote: Every man is a damn fool for at least five minutes every day; wisdom consists in not exceeding the limit.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: In youth and beauty, wisdom is but rare!
name: Homer

quote: The soul's joy lies in doing.
name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: Wisdom is always an overmatch for strength.
name: Phil Jackson

quote: The wisdom of the wise and the experience of the ages are perpetuated by quotations.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Man is only great when he acts from passion.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Wisdom is the supreme part of happiness.
name: Sophocles

quote: Much wisdom often goes with fewest words.
name: Sophocles

quote: Almost every wise saying has an opposite one, no less wise, to balance it.
name: George Santayana

quote: A prudent question is one-half of wisdom.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: A mistake is simply another way of doing things.
name: Katharine Graham

quote: Science gives us knowledge, but only philosophy can give us wisdom.
name: Will Durant

quote: I didn't get where I am today by worryin' about how I'd feel tomorrow.
name: Ron White

quote: You must accept responsibility for your actions, but not the credit for your achievements.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: Though sages may pour out their wisdom's treasure, there is no sterner moralist than pleasure.
name: Lord Byron

quote: The clouds may drop down titles and estates, and wealth may seek us, but wisdom must be sought.
name: Edward Young

quote: What is man's ultimate direction in life? It is to look for love, truth, virtue, and beauty.
name: Shinichi Suzuki

quote: It isn't right to judge strength as better than good wisdom.
name: Xenophanes

quote: He was gifted with the sly, sharp instinct for self-preservation that passes for wisdom among the rich.
name: Evelyn Waugh

quote: Kindness is wisdom.
name: Philip James Bailey

quote: Beauty, the eternal Spouse of the Wisdom of God and Angel of his Presence thru' all creation.
name: Robert Bridges

quote: We can be knowledgable with other men's knowledge but we cannot be wise with other men's wisdom.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Without courage, wisdom bears no fruit.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: The more you meditate on the laws of Moses, the more striking and brighter does their wisdom appear.
name: John Quincy Adams

quote: All free governments are managed by the combined wisdom and folly of the people.
name: James A. Garfield

quote: Teach your children poetry; it opens the mind, lends grace to wisdom and makes the heroic virtues hereditary.
name: Walter Scott

quote: Wisdom has never made a bigot, but learning has.
name: Josh Billings

quote: Our happiness depends on wisdom all the way.
name: Sophocles

quote: To keep your secret is wisdom; but to expect others to keep it is folly.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: The hunger for facile wisdom is the root of all false philosophy.
name: George Santayana

quote: Never cut what you can untie.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: I prefer the folly of enthusiasm to the indifference of wisdom.
name: Anatole France

quote: A fool flatters himself, a wise man flatters the fool.
name: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: From the errors of others, a wise man corrects his own.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: Strength and wisdom are not opposing values.
name: William J. Clinton

quote: Never does nature say one thing and wisdom another.
name: Juvenal

quote: If you want to be found stand where the seeker seeks.
name: Sidney Lanier

quote: Tis but a part we see, and not a whole.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: Wisdom doesn't necessarily come with age. Sometimes age just shows up all by itself.
name: Tom Wilson

quote: He who lives by the crystal ball soon learns to eat ground glass.
name: Edgar Fiedler

quote: The enemy of the conventional wisdom is not ideas but the march of events.
name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: Who in their infinite wisdom decreed that Little League uniforms be white? Certainly not a mother.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: Each of us finds his unique vehicle for sharing with others his bit of wisdom.
name: Ram Dass

quote: The lure of the distant and the difficult is deceptive. The great opportunity is where you are.
name: John Burroughs

quote: Wisdom cannot come by railroad or automobile or aeroplane, or be hurried up by telegraph or telephone.
name: John Burroughs

quote: Knowing that you are going to die is, I suspect, the beginning of wisdom.
name: Terry Pratchett

quote: It's not the having, it's the getting.
name: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: For all my education, accomplishments, and so called 'wisdom'... I can't fathom my own heart.
name: Michael Caine

quote: A short saying often contains much wisdom.
name: Sophocles

quote: If you were to offer a thirsty man all wisdom, you would not please him more than if you gave him a drink.
name: Sophocles

quote: Along with success comes a reputation for wisdom.
name: Euripides

quote: Wisdom comes from within. Knowledge is acquired and can sometimes put a screen on your wisdom.
name: A. R. Rahman

quote: If fortune favors you do not be elated; if she frowns do not despond.
name: Ausonius

quote: Rarely promise, but, if lawful, constantly perform.
name: William Penn

quote: One part of wisdom is knowing what you don't need anymore and letting it go.
name: Jane Fonda

quote: We have no words for speaking of wisdom to the stupid. He who understands the wise is wise already.
name: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quote: The conventional wisdom is that if you are gay, you cannot play the romantic straight lead in a movie.
name: Ian Mckellen

quote: Repeat anything often enough and it will start to become you.
name: Tom Hopkins

quote: We give advice, but we cannot give the wisdom to profit by it.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: I'm not wise, but the beginning of wisdom is there; it's like relaxing into - and an acceptance of - things.
name: Tina Turner

quote: In the vain laughter of folly wisdom hears half its applause.
name: George Eliot

quote: More helpful than all wisdom is one draught of simple human pity that will not forsake us.
name: George Eliot

quote: Suffering is one of life's great teachers.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: Self-suggestion makes you master of yourself.
name: W. Clement Stone

quote: When defeat is inevitable, it is wisest to yield.
name: Quintilian

quote: I gave my beauty and my youth to men. I am going to give my wisdom and experience to animals.
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: Economists often like startling theorems, results which seem to run counter to conventional wisdom.
name: Joseph Stiglitz

quote: Wisdom consists not so much in knowing what to do in the ultimate as knowing what to do next.
name: Herbert Hoover

quote: Virtues are acquired through endeavor, which rests wholly upon yourself.
name: Sidney Lanier

quote: Wisdom we know is the knowledge of good and evil, not the strength to choose between the two.
name: John Cheever

quote: Better than the strength of men and horses is our wisdom.
name: Xenophanes

quote: Purity engenders Wisdom, Passion avarice, and Ignorance folly, infatuation and darkness.
name: Cyril Connolly

quote: Above all, you must fight conceit, envy, and every kind of ill-feeling in your heart.
name: Abraham Cahan

quote: Theology in general seems to me a substitution of human ingenuity for divine wisdom.
name: Julia Ward Howe

quote: Books are the ever burning lamps of accumulated wisdom.
name: George William Curtis

quote: Your aim will be knowledge and wisdom, not the reflected glamour of fame.
name: Abbott L. Lowell

quote: We are to seek wisdom and understanding only in the length of days.
name: Robert Hall

quote: After all my possessions had been burned, God gave me the wisdom to return to Jerusalem.
name: Shmuel Yosef Agnon

quote: Never accept ultimatums, conventional wisdom, or absolutes.
name: Christopher Reeve

quote: It is the mind that maketh good or ill, That maketh wretch or happy, rich or poor.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: When you doubt, abstain.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Good nature is worth more than knowledge, more than money, more than honor, to the persons who possess it.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: In the frank expression of conflicting opinions lies the greatest promise of wisdom in governmental action.
name: Louis D. Brandeis

quote: Learning sleeps and snores in libraries, but wisdom is everywhere, wide awake, on tiptoe.
name: Josh Billings

quote: Few of the many wise apothegms which have been uttered have prevented a single foolish action.
name: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quote: Young people, you need the wisdom of age, just as some of us older ones need your enthusiasm for life.
name: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: The future has already arrived. It's just not evenly distributed yet.
name: William Gibson

quote: Now that I am sixty, I see why the idea of elder wisdom has passed from currency.
name: John Updike

quote: Wisdom begins at the end.
name: Daniel Webster

quote: Perhaps too much of everything is as bad as too little.
name: Edna Ferber

quote: The greatest wisdom is to realize one's lack of it.
name: Constantin Stanislavski

quote: If you wish to reach the highest, begin at the lowest.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: Sciences may be learned by rote, but wisdom not.
name: Laurence Sterne

quote: Keep well; that is the half of wisdom and of happiness.
name: Emile Zola

quote: Not by age but by capacity is wisdom acquired.
name: Plautus

quote: It is great folly to wish to be wise all alone.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Wisdom is that apprehension of heavenly things to which the spirit rises through love.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: I have no agenda except to be funny. Neither I or the writers profess to offer any worldly wisdom.
name: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quote: We thought, because we had power, we had wisdom.
name: Stephen Vincent Benet

quote: In your 20s you can be pretty, but you don't accomplish real beauty until you find wisdom and depth.
name: Evangeline Lilly

quote: Knowledge is a process of piling up facts; wisdom lies in their simplification.
name: Martin H. Fischer

quote: Enraging liberals is simply one of the more enjoyable side effects of my wisdom.
name: Rush Limbaugh

quote: I reject most conventional wisdom.
name: Rush Limbaugh

quote: Saudi Arabia is a puritanical state that claims a monopoly of wisdom and virtue.
name: James Buchan

quote: True wisdom listens more, talks less and can get along with all types of people.
name: Kiana Tom

quote: Let us act on what we have, since we have not what we wish.
name: John Henry Newman

quote: Authority without wisdom is like a heavy ax without an edge, fitter to bruise than polish.
name: Anne Bradstreet

quote: Combine the extremes, and you will have the true center.
name: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: To think ill of mankind and not wish ill to them, is perhaps the highest wisdom and virtue.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: Even youngish men can acquire wisdom as time goes by.
name: John Bercow

quote: The art of storytelling is reaching its end because the epic side of truth, wisdom, is dying out.
name: Walter Benjamin

quote: Has fortune dealt you some bad cards. Then let wisdom make you a good gamester.
name: Francis Quarles

quote: Wisdom prepares for the worst, but folly leaves the worst for the day when it comes.
name: Richard Cecil

quote: Books give not wisdom where none was before. But where some is, there reading makes it more.
name: Elizabeth Hardwick

quote: Wisdom is knowledge which has become a part of one's being.
name: Orison Swett Marden

quote: It is wisdom in prosperity, when all is as thou wouldn't have it, to fear and suspect the worst.
name: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: All human wisdom works and has worries and grief as reward.
name: Johann Georg Hamann

quote: People seldom refuse help, if one offers it in the right way.
name: A. C. Benson

quote: Most things break, including hearts. The lessons of life amount not to wisdom, but to scar tissue and callus.
name: Wallace Stegner

quote: Everything important always begins from something trivial.
name: Donald Hall

quote: Words of wisdom are spoken by children at least as often as scientists.
name: James Newman

quote: It is costly wisdom that is bought by experience.
name: Roger Ascham

quote: Pessimism is only the name that men of weak nerves give to wisdom.
name: Bernard DeVoto

quote: Losing faith in your own singularity is the start of wisdom, I suppose; also the first announcement of death.
name: Peter Conrad

quote: Wisdom denotes the pursuing of the best ends by the best means.
name: Francis Hutcheson

quote: There is often, in the affairs of government, more efficiency and wisdom in non-action than in action.
name: John C. Calhoun

quote: I always want to be a messenger, a person that, you know, that's not afraid to pass on wisdom.
name: Mary J. Blige

quote: Putting is like wisdom - partly a natural gift and partly the accumulation of experience.
name: Arnold Palmer

quote: Better mad with the rest of the world than wise alone.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: I'm a member of the 1960s generation. We didn't have any wisdom.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Back of every mistaken venture and defeat is the laughter of wisdom, if you listen.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: Trouble shared is trouble halved.
name: Lee Iacocca

quote: Thinking is not enough. There is no final enough of wisdom, experience - any... thing.
name: William S. Burroughs

quote: At sixty, I know little more about wisdom than I did at thirty, but I know a great deal more about folly.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: The wisdom of age: don't stop walking.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: Full of wisdom are the ordinations of fate.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: They would need to be already wise, in order to love wisdom.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Silence at the proper season is wisdom, and better than any speech.
name: Plutarch

quote: Moderation is the inseparable companion of wisdom, but with it genius has not even a nodding acquaintance.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Doubt is the vestibule through which all must pass before they can enter into the temple of wisdom.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: What is all wisdom save a collection of platitudes?
name: Norman Douglas

quote: The sublimity of wisdom is to do those things living, which are to be desired when dying.
name: Norman Douglas

quote: We must learn from the sermons of Christ, the wisdom of Laotzu, the teachings of Buddha.
name: Charles Lindbergh

quote: Outside of hip-hop, it was in comics that I most often found the aesthetics and wisdom of my world reflected.
name: Ta-Nehisi Coates

quote: The difference between chirping out of turn and a faux pas depends on what kind of a bar you're in.
name: Wilson Mizner

quote: It is not who is right, but what is right, that is of importance.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: Wisdom is the quality that keeps you from getting into situations where you need it.
name: Doug Larson

quote: Blessed are they who seek to learn wisdom.
name: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: Not engaging in ignorance is wisdom.
name: Bodhidharma

quote: You can practice to attain knowledge, but you can't practice to attain wisdom.
name: Herbie Hancock

quote: The thing that we possess, that machines don't, is the ability to exhibit wisdom.
name: Herbie Hancock

quote: Without wisdom, the future has no meaning, no valuable purpose.
name: Herbie Hancock

quote: Look twice before you leap.
name: Charlotte Bronte

quote: You have to know when to stop - that's wisdom.
name: Hubert de Givenchy

quote: Some coaches pray for wisdom. I pray for 260-pound tackles. They'll give me plenty of wisdom.
name: Chuck Noll

quote: Wisdom may best arise from a humbling reality.
name: Michael Leunig

quote: I haven't any wisdom - just a child like everybody else. I'm not as great as Frank Lloyd Wright.
name: Philip Johnson

quote: It's very hard to know what wisdom is.
name: James Hillman

quote: I'm now the elder in the position of doling out wisdom and trying to mend fences.
name: Jane Fonda

quote: The more one pleases everybody, the less one pleases profoundly.
name: Stendhal

quote: The less you talk, the more you're listened to.
name: Pauline Phillips

quote: Wisdom is humble that he knows no more.
name: William Cowper

quote: It is astonishing with how little wisdom mankind can be governed, when that little wisdom is its own.
name: William Inge

quote: The extreme limit of wisdom, that's what the public calls madness.
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: All of us, at certain moments of our lives, need to take advice and to receive help from other people.
name: Alexis Carrel

quote: Wisdom is not attained by years, but by ability.
name: Plautus

quote: My dad was a man of great wisdom in his short time here.
name: Bonnie Hunt

quote: You want people walking away from the conversation with some kernel of wisdom or some kind of impact.
name: Harry Dean Stanton

quote: In seeking wisdom thou art wise; in imagining that thou hast attained it - thou art a fool.
name: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: This age thinks better of a gilded fool Than of a threadbare saint in wisdom's school.
name: Thomas Dekker

quote: Men who know themselves are no longer fools. They stand on the threshold of the door of Wisdom.
name: Havelock Ellis

quote: A man begins cutting his wisdom teeth the first time he bites off more than he can chew.
name: Herb Caen

quote: There's a real wisdom to not saying a thing.
name: Willem Dafoe

quote: I associate wisdom and grace with age.
name: Christy Turlington

quote: We do not sit as a superlegislature to weigh the wisdom of legislation.
name: William O. Douglas

quote: When you betray somebody else, you also betray yourself.
name: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: If an idea is indeed sensible, it will eventually become just part of the accepted wisdom.
name: Nigel Farage

quote: Many of us spend half of our time wishing for things we could have if we didn't spend half our time wishing.
name: Alexander Woollcott

quote: Man's wisdom is his best friend; folly his worst enemy.
name: William Temple

quote: A great memory is never made synonymous with wisdom, any more than a dictionary would be called a treatise.
name: John Henry Newman

quote: We all have within us a deep wisdom, but sometimes we don't know we have it.
name: Shakti Gawain

quote: Public opinion is no more than this: what people think that other people think.
name: Alfred Austin

quote: I am thinking of taking a fifth wife. Why not? Solomon had a thousand wives and he is a synonym for wisdom.
name: John Barrymore

quote: Once I turned 35, I got the bonus of some wisdom and began to accept life on its own terms.
name: Mike Myers

quote: Women are stronger than men - they do not die of wisdom.
name: James Stephens

quote: There is a trade off - as you grow older you gain wisdom but you lose spontaneity.
name: Kenny Rogers

quote: Let me warn you, if you start chasing after views, you'll be left without bread and without views.
name: Nikolai Gogol

quote: Our wisdom comes from our experience, and our experience comes from our foolishness.
name: Sacha Guitry

quote: Though I am fascinated by knowledge, I am even more fascinated by wisdom.
name: Abraham Verghese

quote: My mother is a great source of advice and wisdom and consolation for me.
name: Katherine Heigl

quote: It is always our own self that we find at the end of the journey. The sooner we face that self, the better.
name: Ella Maillart

quote: Wisdom and goodness are twin-born, one heart must hold both sisters, never seen apart.
name: William Dean Howells

quote: He dares to be a fool, and that is the first step in the direction of wisdom.
name: James Huneker

quote: You can't sweep other people off their feet, if you can't be swept off your own.
name: Clarence Day

quote: Some folks are wise and some are otherwise.
name: Tobias Smollett

quote: Preconceived notions are the locks on the door to wisdom.
name: Mary Browne

quote: Conventional wisdom tells us we'll only be happier after a divorce if the marriage itself was a war zone.
name: Ariel Gore

quote: The wisdom acquired with the passage of time is a useless gift unless you share it.
name: Esther Williams

quote: He who devotes sixteen hours a day to hard study may become at sixty as wise as he thought himself at twenty.
name: Mary Wilson Little
